an10.5:4.1: * Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi … pe …
an10.5:4.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ;
an10.5:4.4: pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti;
an10.5:4.5: pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi;
an10.5:4.6: passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sukhaṃ;
an10.5:4.7: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
an10.5:4.8: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
an10.5:4.9: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an10.5:4.10: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an10.5:4.12: Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi …
an10.5:4.15: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro;
an10.5:4.16: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti … pe …
an10.5:5.1: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
an10.5:5.2: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ;
an10.5:5.3: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti;
an10.5:5.4: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi;
an10.5:5.5: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sukhaṃ;
an10.5:5.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an10.5:5.7: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
an10.5:5.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an10.5:5.9: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an10.5:5.14: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
an10.5:5.15: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti … pe …
